channel.title: Some useful commands to have on an 317 delta
channel.description:
wwhat are some good commands to help with security of your rsps, or just be helpful to have. here are some i have
::xteletome (playername)
::bootall
::xteleto (playername)
::ipban (username)
::banuser (username)
::mute (playername)
::message (sends system message)
::changepassword (new password)
::mypos //like my position
::tele (x coords) (y coords)
::jail (playername)
::onpickup //this makes it so everyone can pick up items
::offpickup //this makes it so no one can pick up items
::ipmute
::update (time in seconds) //makes update in a certain time appear above chatbox like real rs
::npcreset //this puts all the npc back to original spot
and ::alltome
